participant_1.background:
I'm not a morning person, but I love going hiking with my friends.
I listen to chill music while I read my children's books and play with my toys.
i do not have many friends.
i do not like the song sweet home alabama.
i donate any overstock to charity.

participant_2.background:
I've got a laptop to help me keep track of my gardening plans.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.
I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.
I got injured while running and had to stop for a few weeks.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Not too bad, just got back from a run. How about you?
I am doing well. I am actually getting ready to go on a hike.
Nice! I love going on hikes. Where are you hiking to?
I am going to a local park. It is not very far from my house.
That sounds nice. I love being outdoors. I am a bit of a nature lover.
Me too! I like to go camping and fishing.
I do not get to camp as much as I would like to. I have a lot of responsibilities at home.
I understand. I have a lot of responsibilities too. But I try to make time for the things that I love.
That is good. It is important to have a balance in life.
I agree. So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.
I do not watch much TV, but I do enjoy reading.
Me too! I love reading children's books. I also love to read to my kids.
That is so sweet! I do not have any kids, but I would love to have some one day.
They are a lot of work, but they are also a lot of fun.
I am sure they are. I am looking forward to it one day.
